description:
go-tour: add note about Go playground's clock time
        Also fix a small comment in gotour/local.go

messages.text:
LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/6822107/diff/5001/static/index.html
File static/index.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6822107/diff/5001/static/index.html#newcode1080
static/index.html:1080: so don't be surprised if the code gives incorrect result.
This is all you need:

Note: Time in the Go playground is fixed at 2009-11-10 23:00:00 UTC,
a value whose significance is left as an exercise for the reader.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour/

PTAL.
On 2012/11/11 18:02:56, r wrote:
http://codereview.appspot.com/6822107/diff/5001/static/index.html#newcode1080
> static/index.html:1080: so don't be surprised if the code gives incorrect
> result.
> This is all you need:
> Note: Time in the Go playground is fixed at 2009-11-10 23:00:00 UTC,
> a value whose significance is left as an exercise for the reader.
Done.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=35aa8dc3dadc ***

go-tour: add note about Go playground's clock time
        Also fix a small comment in gotour/local.go

R=golang-dev, r, adg
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/6822107

LGTM after this mod

https://codereview.appspot.com/6822107/diff/15001/static/index.html
File static/index.html (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6822107/diff/15001/static/index.html#newcode1085
static/index.html:1085: Note: Time in the Go playground is fixed at 2009-11-10 23:00:00 UTC,
it's not exactly 'fixed' now, is it? maybe
Note: Programs in the Go playground always appear to start at 2009-11-10 23:00:00 UTC,

PTAL.
On 2012/12/13 17:24:26, r wrote:
> https://codereview.appspot.com/6822107/diff/15001/static/index.html#newcode1085
> static/index.html:1085: Note: Time in the Go playground is fixed at 2009-11-10
> 23:00:00 UTC,
> it's not exactly 'fixed' now, is it? maybe
> Note: Programs in the Go playground always appear to start at 2009-11-10
> 23:00:00 UTC,

subject: code review 6822107: go-tour: add note about Go playground's constant clock time
